question:
Which of the chronological order for the construction of the following is correct?
I. Taj Mahal
II. Qutab Minar
III. Fatehpur Sikri
IV. Agra Fort
explanation: Taj Mahal was commissioned in 1632 by the Mughal emperor, Shah Jahan, to house the tomb of his favourite wife, Mumtaz Mahal.  Qutab minar was built in 1193 by Qutab-ud-din Aibak immediately after the defeat of Delhi\'s last Hindu kingdom.  Fatehpur Sikri was founded as the capital of Mughal Empire in 1571 by Emperor Akbar. Agra Fort was built in 1565.
